nodes.text: Brian Kalin O'Connell is one of the episodic directors of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series.

Brian Kalin O'Connell attended school at Otis College of Art and Design from 1988 to 1990. Five years later, he began work as a conceptual, character, and creature artist at Industrial Light & Magic, where he stayed from 1995 to 2006, before moving to a director position at Lucasfilm Animation for The Clone Wars series.
